refnamediv.refpurpose: A timer than can be triggered

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [sim, TimerActive, Counter] = ld_Timer(sim, events, Trigger, Count )

para.para: The timer is active for Count simulation steps
TimerActive * - int32 1 if the timer is active, 0 if not
Counter * (int32) - The used conter that starts from Count and decreases
